checkLink(String) - Method in class crawler.service.Crawler
This method checks if the given link is valid
Crawler - Class in crawler.service
The crawler program implements and REST API service that provides 3 functionalities: crawl the whole website find a specific item on the website show data about a specific crawling action
Crawler() - Constructor for class crawler.service.Crawler
 
crawler.model - package crawler.model
 
crawler.service - package crawler.service

CrawlingAction - Class in crawler.model
This is a data class an instance of which contains information about a single crawling action.
CrawlingAction(int, String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class crawler.model.CrawlingAction
 
crawlingActions - Variable in class crawler.service.Crawler
 
crawlWebsite() - Method in class crawler.service.Crawler
This is a GET method that uses the createActionFindAllDocuments function and returns the result in a json format
createActionFindAllDocuments(String) - Method in class crawler.service.Crawler
This method creates an action to crawl the whole website
createActionFindItem(String, String) - Method in class crawler.service.Crawler
This method creates an action to find an item
